mapper.select: select article.id,category.name, article.title, article.content, article.readCount, article.commentCount, article.author, article.createTime, article.updateTime FROM article LEFT JOIN category ON article.categoryId=category.id ORDER BY article.createTime DESC limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}

select article.id,category.name AS category, article.title, article.content, article.readCount, article.commentCount, article.author, article.createTime, article.updateTime FROM article LEFT JOIN category ON article.categoryId=category.id ORDER BY article.createTime DESC
